bropals.lib.simplegame

Class GameCursor

  • java.lang.Object
    • bropals.lib.simplegame.GameCursor

  • public class GameCursor
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a cursor drawn with an image.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameCursor(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image, int offsetX, int offsetY)
      Creates a new GameCursor.

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage getImage()
      Gets the image for this GameCursor.
      int getOffsetX()
      Gets the X offset at which the image's top left corner will be from the cursor's hotspot.
      int getOffsetY()
      Gets the Y offset at which the image's top left corner will be from the cursor's hotspot.

      Sets the image for this GameCursor
      void setOffsetX(int offsetX)
      Sets the X offset at which the image's top left corner will be from the cursor's hotspot.
      void setOffsetY(int offsetY)
      Sets the Y offset at which the image's top left corner will be from the cursor's hotspot.
